Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to restricting advertisement and promotion of electronic cigarettes
Summary: Provides restrictions on advertisement and promotion of electronic cigarettes; prohibits misrepresentations regarding health consequences; prohibits agreements which suppress research data regarding health consequences of vaping.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to restricting advertisement and promotion of electronic cigarettes
